text: Lars Tunbjörk (15 February 1956 – 8 April 2015) was a Swedish photographer.Lars Tunbjörk visade oss Sverige genom sitt eget vemod He was known for taking pictures of the Swedish landscape and landmarks. He was born in Borås, Sweden. Tunbjörk died on 8 April 2015. His death was announced on 11 April. No cause of death was given. He was 59 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1956 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swedish photographers
title: Lars Tunbjörk
